entries.name: ds-gapminder
entries.author: Dereck de Mézquita
entries.displayName: Data Science: gapminder dataset visualisations and data munging
entries.summary: Visualisation and analysis skills by analysing gapminder datasets. Tech stack includes R, tidyverse, ggplot2, plotly, xml2, rvest; SQLite; JavaScript, D3.js; HTML, and CSS.

entries.name: ds-NLP-network-inference
entries.author: Dereck de Mézquita
entries.displayName: Data Science: natural language processing & network inference
entries.summary: The goal of this project is to analyse chat data with my girlfriend; apply statistical methods, graph theory, and other data science techniques.

entries.name: derecksnotes
entries.author: Dereck de Mézquita
entries.summary: This very website is 100% custom made by yours truly! It took me a number of years to perfect the styling. The content is a continual effort.
